about_the_game:
Hello, This is a game about Lottery Center. In this game, You will act the administrator of a lottery center.
There is a city in this game. In this city, lotteries can only be saled by the government. The Lottery Center is responsible for it. You will act the administrator of the Lottery Center. Your goal is earn more money to develop the city in order to imporve the life of the citizen, and at the same time, you can not let the lottery center go broke.
In this game, you have two kinds of operations, sales the lotteries and build the buildings.
I. Sales the Lotteries
You can build the lottery shop to sales lotteries. You can sale two kinds of lotteries, Numeric Type and Scratch-open Type.
II. Build the buildings
You can build the lottery shop, hospital and supermarket. Of course, what should be build is depend you. However, inappropriate buildings will let the lottery center go broke.
detailed_description:
Hello, This is a game about Lottery Center. In this game, You will act the administrator of a lottery center.
There is a city in this game. In this city, lotteries can only be saled by the government. The Lottery Center is responsible for it. You will act the administrator of the Lottery Center. Your goal is earn more money to develop the city in order to imporve the life of the citizen, and at the same time, you can not let the lottery center go broke.
In this game, you have two kinds of operations, sales the lotteries and build the buildings.
I. Sales the Lotteries
You can build the lottery shop to sales lotteries. You can sale two kinds of lotteries, Numeric Type and Scratch-open Type.
II. Build the buildings
You can build the lottery shop, hospital and supermarket. Of course, what should be build is depend you. However, inappropriate buildings will let the lottery center go broke.
name: Lottery Center Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Win10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
